name: Miner Escape: Puzzle Adventure
description: Trapped deep! Can you escape the crumbling mine in Miner: Escape? Unravel puzzles, unlock secrets, and conquer exciting levels in this thrilling 3D adventure. Test your skills, race the clock, and become the ultimate escape artist! Add Miner: Escape to your wishlist today!

name: House of Horrors
description: Lost in the woods, you seek refuge in a desolate mansion. Big mistake. Now you're trapped with bloodthirsty maniacs and ravenous cannibals. Fight for your life, solve chilling mysteries, and escape this house of horrors before you become dinner.

name: Kick'n Hell
description: Kick'n Hell is a retro style 3D precision platformer where you traverse the nine circles of hell as a martial artist and kick filthy demons! Do you have what it takes to escape and show Satan who's boss? Take on the ultimate test and show us what you got!

name: The Mara Witch
description: "The Mara Witch" invites players to embark on an unforgettable journey deep into the heart of Africa. Assume the role of Leboo, a young Maasai warrior navigating a landscape fraught with tragedy, betrayal, and mystical encounters.

name: Silva
description: Silva is a platform and action game, with elements of RogueLike, which brings a lot of action and dynamic gameplay, where we will bring you a mix of ancient cultural elements with Brazilian history in a playful way.

name: Stickman Browser
description: Play the stickman fight in the browser! Destroying all Website Elements! Like what we all have imagined when we are a child!

name: Tiny Planet
description: Create your very own tiny planet and place it among the stars in the vast expanse of the universe !

name: Chaos Islands
description: Chaos Islands is a city-builder that unites deck-building and tower defense mechanics with roguelite elements. As the last bastion of humanity forced to escape to the skies to hide from invading forces of demons. Protect your settlement and do not let the evil forces pass.

name: CyberTaxi: Lunatic Nights
description: CyberTaxi Lunatic Nights is a free roam taxi driving simulator set in a dark-noir Prison City. As a cab driver you have to find your wrongfully accused sister and rescue her from this dystopian city-facility. Complete unique missions, defeat lurking thugs and maintain your fuel level to succeed!

name: Kolt Penny's Symmetris
description: Match the pieces! Grow that multiplier! Get that high score!

name: Brave Legacy
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Rusted Sea
description: Earth's surface has been dessimated by radiation from The War. The only remaining safe havens are found under the seas. Now you must cook, craft, and survive alone in your submarine, delivering vital supplies to the Starving Survivors - all while battling monsters both real and imagined.

name: Yandere Simulator: Midori Adventure - The Visual Novel
description: Yandere visual novel fan game.

name: Safebreaker
description: Take on the role of a safebreaker who must break as many codes as possible to safes located in a closed bank. There is not much time left. Using your skills and hearing, you must decipher as many access codes to bank safes as possible and finally get to the large vault, where the main prize awaits.

name: Truth Universally Acknowledged
description: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a teenage boy in possession of a fine life must be in want of a boyfriend.

name: Enemy Metal
description: 2.5D Roguelite Shooter with Unique Gameplay, Powerful Weapons and a Killer Soundtrack. Battle the dangerous enemies and defend the planets of the Sunstar System! Gather crystals and destroy turrets to level up and unlock exciting new Starships on each planet!

name: Fio Fizhook
description: A colorful first person game about a made-up sport. Throw an anchor, hook peculiar fish and punch them through ramps and turns!

name: Whelm
description: A mysterious island has fallen into disrepair and only you can save it. Rescue animals, replant seeds and repair machines. We're counting on you, young penguin.

name: Spellbrew Express
description: Low wages, high adventure – every delivery is a magical struggle. Bounce, blast, and cast through treacherous ruins and vibrant forests in this movement-based 2D platformer. That goblin brew atop the mountain won't deliver itself. Time is money— get moving!

name: Highway Gas Gas
description: Buckle up tight, boss, because we've got the boys in blue hot on our tail!

name: Jupiter Junkworks
description: Fast paced arcade puzzle action awaits you in Jupiter Junkworks! Complete arcade puzzle contracts to earn resources while rebuilding and upgrading a ruined spaceship junkyard. All set in a sci-fi narrative campaign mode where you'll join an unlikely trio of travellers as they overcome challenges.

name: Temples vs. Buildings
description: Temples vs Buildings is a roguelike with shoot'em up elements. The player will control flying temples of many cultures and fight against a vast array of flying buildings.

name: Advancing Chess
description: Experience the beloved game of chess in ways never before seen! Starting with just your King and a Pawn, you’ll strategically assemble your board with pieces of your choice. But be warned, you’ll be facing off against boards uniquely crafted by other players, there’s no telling what to expect!

name: Scaredy Cat
description: Henny has been worn-to-the-bone by a soulsucking corporate career that has gifted her with heart problems. After she rage quits and starts pet sitting, she discovers her new gig will be just as horrifying as her last.

name: Viridian
description: A journalist is trapped in a terrifying technological box of illusions where he is on a journey to discover the truth behind his family's darkest secrets.

name: Distant Isles
description: Distant Isles is a party-based RPG with roguelike features. Stranded on a procedurally-generated island you will gather party members, explore and fight creatures in search of hidden treasures.

name: Jetrunner
description: Jetrunner is an action packed parkour first person shooter set in a crazy sci-fi future.

name: Run Dungeon
description: Run Dungeon combines the heart-pounding action of an endless runner combined with the strategic depth of an RPG. An infinite dungeon full of monsters, loot, traps, spells, and bosses awaits you.

name: Broadvay
description: Welcome to BROADVAY! BROADVAY is an online platform where you can hold live performances and events with your own avatar. Communicate with your fans through various interactions and support your virtual idols with BROADVAY's own donations!

name: Dark Investigation
description: Maybe you like to explore the park up and down, or explore the depths of the underground sea where there is no water, only chrome! Do you want to control huge demons? Or do you want to become a god to the local creatures!CONTROL UNIVERSE, TIME, CREATURES, GODS AND OTHER.

name: Zeta Wave Infinity
description:
Enjoy in this adrenalinic arcade game with the beatiful AI pilots named
ZETA and OMEGA

name: Yandere Institute Dating Simulator
description: Yandere flash game by chibixi

name: Find Eden
description: In this cute adventure game you play as Timmy, who was magically teleported into the realm of cats. Unravel the mystery of Eden and awaken the fighting spirit of the felines. You solve puzzles, defeat monsters, upgrade new powers, all while meeting quirky cats in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Police Station Simulator
description: You’re in charge of a run-down police station. Will you manage to restore it to its former glory? Arm yourself with some coffee and donuts, because there's a lot of renovation and micro-management work to do!

name: Hot Pot Game
description: Hot pot game is a cute merge puzzle game with high replay value. Keep up a merge streak for getting helpful items. Utilize a variety of unique items and cook the best hot pot ever.

name: Rise of Industry 2
description: Navigate the competitive industrial landscape of vibrant 1980's USA! Make strategic manufacturing decisions, optimize production chains, acquire technologies, and expand your global business network with key contacts. Opportunities await those savvy enough to capitalize on them!

name: Bitmagic
description: Imagine games — Use Bitmagic’s new text-to-game platform to bring your game ideas to life. Instantly.

name: Jumplife
description: Jumplife is a minimalistic platformer with lots of wall jumping and wall sliding.

name: Carnival
description: Carnival is a first-person horror game that immerses you in a cursed amusement park. Explore eerie attractions, solve puzzles, confront bosses, and upgrade your arsenal. Uncover the secrets of the Sterling family amidst relentless darkness.

name: Postrok
description: Unleash your inner warrior in this unique roguelite odyssey. Experience explosive quests, leverage the mystic powers of Bifrospheres, uncover potent Runes, and maintain your Hugr in a chaotic, post-Ragnarok realm.

name: Solis
description: Elio is a boy who deals with reality through imagination. He finds himself trapped in a dark dungeon mirroring his thoughts. This wordless puzzle platformer tells a story through memory shards. Only by gathering them, he hopes to break free.

name: Zombie Parkour Apocalypse
description: Zombie Parkour apocalypse is FPS action game with mini open world game where you and your friends have to survive

name: Recycle it!
description: In "Recycle it!", you embark on an exhilarating journey as a bold bottle with an insatiable curiosity, daring to explore the vast expanse of the house while its inhabitants are absent.

name: Mother's Sword
description: Make your way through a ruined world with Metroidvania elements, unleash fast and powerful attacks with your sword, face fearsome enemies in difficult combat. Take a breath, be brave and learn the whereabouts of the sword you possess.

name: Touhou Female Fist Mutation
description: The game is a combat AVG game that combines male awakening concepts with Eastern project themes.

name: Tiny Circumstance
description: a small rotatable scene, accompanied by a stream of thoughts

name: Odyssey of the Anachronistic Tome
description: "Odyssey of the Anachronistic Tome" features Patchouli Knowledge who was pulled into a strange, forgotten Gensokyo from a long abandoned canon with the gameplay inspired by the very first Touhou! This is our little alpha build for the Touhou Game Jam 13 with the theme "Retroactive, Retrospective, downright... Retro". Thank you for checking out our game! This is not only the first thing we've ever worked on as a group, but the first game any of us have ever worked on as individuals and with only a 72 hour time budget... sorry if the game explodes lol.

name: Imp Encounter
description: Based on the infamous fan fiction Impse, Imp Encounter adds in a cutscene based on the story in the middle of the game.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Orange Switch
description:
The Orange Switch is an e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 1 set of cards. Although technically a Power-Up card, the Orange Switch is labeled as a "Game Level/New Level" card. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e.

Once the card is scanned, any non-boss enemies that Fire Mario defeats with a fireball will turn into a coin, much like in Super Mario World. Compared to the effects of the other switches from Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3, the effect of the Orange Switch is quite minor.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3-e - Blue Green Switch
description:
The Blue Green Switch is an e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 2 set of cards. Although technically a Power-Up card, it was labeled as a "Game Level" card. It can only be used in the main game.

Once the Blue Green Switch is scanned, grass with turnips below appears all throughout the main game, and Mario can pluck them from the ground and throw them at enemies, just like in Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: No Players Online
description: you find an abandoned fps game on an old computer. you decide to play it.

name: Super Roll Out
description:
"Super Roll Out" is the exciting debut game from Project8024Games, blending the charm of classic Nintendo 64 and Sega Dreamcast titles with modern gameplay elements.

Take control of Ballu, the determined protagonist on a mission to halt the havoc caused by the nefarious Dr. Marblous. Journey through diverse worlds,

solving puzzles and gathering shattered Mega Gems to restore peace and thwart tyranny. Explore numerous worlds filled with challenges and uncover thrilling mini-games along the way.

Can you rescue the planets from impending destruction and restore order to the cosmos?

name: Solely Puzzle
description: Solely Puzzle is a browser based jigsaw puzzle game.

name: Kunio no Nekketsu School Fighters
description: A fan adaptation of beat 'n up game River City Girls, adapted into a 1v1 homebrew fighting game for the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis.

name: Monsty Corp: The Prequels
description: Monsty Corp is an advanced science facility in the middle of the Australian desert, Maria, a new member of the Practical AI Division, has been tasked with activating a new AI called "Sentient Artificial and Intelligent Consciousness".

name: Monsty Corp: The Sequels
description: Two Timelines crossing over. Your actions will impact the future in ways you never could have imagined!

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Teki Power Up! Tokuten x2!!
description:
Teki Power Up! Tokuten x2!! is a Japan-exclusive Series 2 e-Reader card that is used with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e. Its key artwork is dark green with a red outline of Bowser.

Once this card is scanned on the e-Reader, it makes all non-lethal damage power down the player to Small form (as in Super Mario Bros. and its derivatives, the Japanese version of Super Mario Bros. 3, and the original version of Super Mario World), replaces most of the enemies with more difficult ones (similar to the Hard Mode of Super Mario Bros.), and doubles the bosses' health. However, the points that the player receives are doubled, making the player's score accumulate much faster.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Sugu ni Mantan! Power Meter!!
description:
Sugu ni mantan! Power Meter!! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was released in Series 2 in Japan. It can be used only in World-e. The key art, similar to the blue switch card, was colored orange with a red outline of Raccoon Mario. The only difference between the two cards is that Mario is facing upright and pointing his left finger.

Once this card is scanned, the Power Meter is halved, making it much easier to run and fly throughout stages.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Timer Yukkuri!
description:
Timer yukkuri! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card that is used with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was included in the Series 2 set of cards. It can be used only in World-e. The key art is light green and featured an outline of Toad.

Once this card gets scanned, the timer and music slow down for the first 50 counts, giving the player more time to complete a level. When 50 counts are past, the "coin" sound is played and the timer and music go back to their original speeds.

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - Luigi Power Up!
description: Luigi Power Up! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card in Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. Released in Series 1 in Japan, it gives Luigi his scuttle ability from Super Mario Bros. 2 and makes his fireballs bounce higher, as in Super Mario World: Super Mario Advance 2. It can be used in the main game, and in World-e (although it is permanently on by default in World-e, without ever needing to scan the card).

name: Super Mario Advance 4: Card e+ - 1UP Kinoko ga 3UP Moon ni Kawaru
description:
1UP Kinoko ga 3UP Moon ni kawaru! is a Japan-exclusive e-Reader card for use with Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3. It was released in Series 1 in Japan. It can be used in both the main game and in World-e. Its key art was orange and featured a red outline of Raccoon Mario, specifically him crouching with his tail extended.

Once it is scanned, all of the 1-Up Mushrooms in the game become 3-Up Moons. This feature allows Mario and Luigi to accumulate extra lives more easily.

name: Super Mario 16: Land of Crisis
description: Super Mario 16: Land of Crisis is a romhack from longtime SMW hacker Alex No. This is his last romhack.

name: Sonic Overture '95
description:
Sonic Overture '95 is a fan-made prequel to the first Sonic the Hedgehog, inspired by 32-bit games from the Saturn era and the scraped concepts from the original Sonic the Hedgehog. It tells the story of Sonic's adventures on Christmas Island.

The game is an unofficial revival of the game known as Sonic Overture, which had a demo released in 2014.
