name: A Boy And His Barrel
description:
You've befriended (and apparently married) a barrel full of blueberry sauce named Violet, but the demons don't understand your love and will attack the both of you without hesitation.

Both of you must make it out alive - if either of you dies, you must restart. Defend her with the limited provisions you get, and escort her to the exit gate!

name: Quarantine
description: Quarantine is a TPS/FPS horror game. Players are expected to escape the quarantine zone by exploring the map, avoiding enemies, and using weapons if necessary.

name: Psyko
description: Framed and on the run, you'll carve a bloody path through a relentless cyberpunk city to escape your pursuers. Can you fight your way free in this unforgiving roguelike?

name: Night Run
description: A stylized night-time speed-running game

name: Knuffi
description: Explore digital world with a cute cat-girl named "Knuffi" in this 2D pixelart platformer. Navigate through a variety of levels, each offering unique challenges. An adorable adventure awaits!

name: Knight Island
description: Tile-based strategy with the best aspects of roguelike deck builders. On top of that, unique mechanics that allow you to shape your island as you wish. Knight Island is a game that blends these features you'll love in this genre and immerses you in unique battles.

name: Killer Junkyard
description: The night is young and you are fuel. Evade grotesque mechanical-human creatures as you attempt to survive until dawn in this PSX style atmospheric horror game.

name: Kazu Aether Origins
description: Kazu Aether Origins is a non-linear hack-slash action adventure on the Isles of Isvenness. Play as a Finnish Spitz as you overcome combat challenges, explore a world of vibrant handcrafted environmental art, and interact with satirical elements for a light-hearted, action-packed gameplay experience.

name: Jumplats
description: Jump through different levels in a game based on "the floor is lava".

name: Down
description: Sin descripción

name: Inverted Journey
description: Inverted Journey is a mind-bending puzzle platformer where you can enter the negative space of levels. Use this unique ability to solve strange puzzles, collect hidden treasures, and journey on a quest to save your little brother from a terrible fate.

name: Internity
description: A capitalist fever dream disguised as a corporate wellness guided meditation. Will you be stuck in the first day of your unpaid internship forever? A unique visual novel experience in virtual reality that combines absurd humor and trippy visuals to tell a story about you, an intern.

name: Insurrection
description: Insurrection is a dark fantasy soulslike RPG. Play as the Skeleton Monk, a powerful mage who can manipulate the elements. Create powerful martial arts combos to avenge your own death and discover the fate of your captured lover.

name: Inflatum
description: Inflatum is a cute animal rescue game. Rescue the poor hapless critter who is only trying to reach his stranded family. Save him from the hazards littering the landscape. Use gas tanks to inflate objects to come to the critter's aid.

name: AirBob
description: Sin descripción

name: How to Survive the Night shift
description: As you begin your night shift in the aged warehouse, an unsettling atmosphere descends. Shadows flit in your peripheral vision, strange whispers echo around you. Finding a mysterious list of rules, you wonder: prank or something serious? Nervously, you step into the dimly lit warehouse.

name: Horror Tomb
description: Horror Tomb is a first person Chinese horror adventure puzzle game set in an Oriental context.

name: Hexforger
description: Hexforger is a fast-paced roguelite in which you cast magic by combining the three primordial orbs. Craft and upgrade powerful spells in the heat of battle. Loot treasures hidden within the rifts. Die, and spend hard-earned gold to return stronger than ever. The realms are yours to conquer.

name: Hemlock
description: An action packed 3rd person Roguelike, With a rich tapestry of handcrafted levels, a multitude of game-changing items, and thrilling boss fights. Are you ready to face the unknown, rewrite your destiny, and emerge victorious in the fight to restore Hemlock?

name: Hell's Bell
description: GO TO HELL ... in this hand-drawn, hack-n-slash adventure. "Hell's Bell" is a story-driven brawler following Bell, who after learning a family secret, finds herself fighting endless hordes of demons in the underworld.

name: Hearts in Orbit: When Stars Align
description: Hearts in Orbit is a fantasy romance visual novel that follows two stars who fell in love and have reincarnated as humans. Will they remember their origins? Will they fall in love again? That's for you to decide.

name: GT and the Evil Factory
description: Discover the Evil Factory’s secrets and fight for the freedom and dignity of robot-kind. Explore the factory, inside and out, dodge security drones, and stop the robot foreman’s evil plans.

name: Granser
description: A story driven rpg inspired by JRPGS like Xenogears/saga, featuring a unique turn based battle system. Follow Saragat and his dubious allies as they untangle the web of lies and attempt to dismantle the shadowy conspiracy of "The Core", as a far greater threat will reawaken.

name: GOS: Gain Of Squad
description: GOS: Gain Of Squad is a multiplayer FPS. Feel the battle with tactical mechanics and destructible environment in different game modes!

name: Golden Road
description: Hey buddy, have you ever driven around your city?

name: Gods of the Arena Dungeon
description: Destroy arena vermin, level up, choose your class path, get loot, and slay other players. Destroy the bosses of the arena without being slain, and perhaps your ascent into arena God-hood will be recorded into legend! Now remastered!

name: Godslayer Arena
description: Godslayer Arena is a fusion of autobattlers and action-rpgs. Draft a set of synergizing spells for your Godslayer to cast and witness their power as they take on the arena. Combat is performed automatically, and success is determined through strategic build creation.

name: Gingar Ail
description: Gingar Ail is a story-based SF RPG indie game set on the Moon Base. Become Asta, the protagonist and one of the agents who lost all her memories in an accident, and discover secrets of the Moon Base. Battles involve turn-based strategy.

name: Ghost of Viyk
description: In the lands of Vyik, death is just the beginning. Tailor your items and abilities to create your unique battle style — and slay enemies who never play by the rules, in this Ukrainian Grimfolk roguelite action. Because the price of freedom is never fair.

name: Ghosthero: Shadow of Vengeance
description: Command your fortress, build defenses, and fight waves of evil. Explore the open world, gather resources, upgrade and finally unleash vengeance on the Titans of Evil. A unique blend of defense, exploration and management. The game is a modern mix of Kingdom and Shadow of the Colossus.

name: Gero-Gero
description: Gero Gero! (Ribbit Ribbit) Control the frog with your voice and guide it to its friend. You can eat the bees, but be careful not to touch them because they sting! Now, let's guide the frog to its friends! (This game use voice as a controller, so microphone is required)

name: Garden of Aiden
description: Venture into "Garden of Aiden," a 2D Metroidvania on mystical Neura Eden. As Aiden, an AI blending magic, tech, and nature, challenge Discord, a rogue AI. Unravel a realm where elements merge, on a quest to restore balance and save your kin. Adventure awaits in this epic of discovery and unity.

name: Galactic Vanguard
description: In Galactic Vanguard, embark on an epic adventure across a galaxy filled with mystery and conflict. As a brave space explorer, your choices will shape the fate of planets and civilizations. Discover uncharted worlds, engage in strategic battles, and forge your path in this handcrafted universe.

name: Forsaken Isles: Xenia's Defense
description: Dive into "Forsaken Isles: Xenia's Defense," a top-down, twin-stick tower defense game where you cast spells and strategize to repel waves of enemies in a fantasy world teetering on the brink.

name: Flow Factory
description: Flow Factory is a physics-based factory automation game. Tinker with complex production lines, make them faster and more efficient. Deal with freely floating pieces and defy gravity. Build, research, optimize. Relax and enjoy everything running smoothly.

name: FMV Soulslike
description: Described as an unholy union of retro nostalgic FMV style atop a modern day soulslike design- a truly unforgettable adventure awaits.

name: Forest Hunt: VR
description: Embark on a thrilling virtual safari in 'VR Forest Hunt,' where the untamed wilderness comes to life in stunning detail. With multiple game modes, including the challenging safari forest hunt and the adrenaline-pumping night forest hunt, each session offers a unique and intense experience.

name: Feralbound Online
description: Feralbound Online encourages you to survive, roleplay, and fight to your hearts content. Featuring endless possibilities for customization; journey throughout different lands as you uncover secrets and meet new friends!

name: Fatal Terminal
description: A retrofuturistic co-op horror about extracting secret objects from abandoned space stations for corporate clients.

name: Faire Hollow
description: Faire Hollow is a cozy 2D crafting management sim and adventure RPG, set in a Renaissance Faire. Establish attractions and games, manage food vendors and shops, and interact with the eccentric locals. Explore a colorful and magical world, and battle the strange monsters that come out at night.

name: Extant: Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation
description: The apocalypse was years ago. Those still living are termed the 'Extant'. The dead can smell the living from a mile away. Because of this, Extant SOG groups of four operators have been tasked with infiltrating areas with supplies alone to retrieve for the Extant civilians. You are one of them.

name: Eastern Heroes
description: Recruit martial arts heroes, practice worldly martial arts, inherit the talents of past generations, then be chivalrous and righteous, finally become a generation of famous heroes, defeat the major sects, stand on top of the martial arts, and become famous all over the world!

name: Eclipse of Elysium
description: JRPG meets Western RPG: Help Aria uncover a dark conspiracy. Battle through hordes of enemies and meet complex and charming characters in a colorful fantasy-world.

name: EcoQuest: Explore, Discover, Protect!
description: “Eco Quest: Explore, Discover, Protect!” thrusts players into the role of Kai, a spirited environmental crusader on a mission to reshape the world’s perspective on water and climate.

name: Edenbound
description: Journey through darkness with "Edenbound." A red panda braves chaos to reach Eden amidst encroaching demons. Navigate landscapes, confront foes, and unravel mysteries. Guide the panda, restore balance.

name: Elumin
description: Worker of honor from Lindenauw, you are mandated on the Tswinoberg exploitation site. A first person exploration experience.

name: Dustopia
description: You live in a world where your card game playing skills determine whether you survive another day. Build your deck, battle your opponents, create your own cards, solve puzzles, help people, and complete your main mission.

name: Dustino 64
description: An indie 3D platformer inspired by Super Mario 64, go from nobody to a hero as Dustin, through vibrant hub worlds and stages to collect enough Gems to save Queen Merigold.

name: Dungeon Slime Hero
description: Dungeon Slime Hero is a Roguelite Dungeon Crawler for semi-casual indie players! Explore the dungeon, level up, and acquire random loot to develop an overpowered build! DSH features click to move and attack controls with a unique combat system for customizing your Slime!

name: Dungeon of Memories
description: A world where a beast consume people's memories. With scant memories left, An 18-year-old fall into this Dungeon through coma, faces challenges to piece together his past, battling creatures, interact with unique NPCs, each memory reclaimed a victory in the hauntingly fascinating dungeon.

name: Dragon Title
description: Card game deck builder with Bullet Hell style combat. Includes Roguelike mode and campaign.

name: Domino Clicker
description: Domino Clicker is a simple clicker game where you can enjoy the thrill of toppling dominoes. With just a click, you can set up plenty of dominoes and revel in the mesmerizing cascade as they fall. It offers straightforward gameplay that anyone can enjoy, providing a calming experience for the mind.

name: Doom Survivors
description: "Doom Survivors" is an action-packed Roguelike game where you obliterate hordes of enemies with deadly weapons, turning them to ashes at your fingertips. Engage in intense battles with ruthless and merciless evil leaders.

name: Dopamine
description: The roguelike where desires and temptations manifest tangibly, and where the pursuit of pleasure can become a trap, break free from the shackles of temptation as you strive to achieve your aspirations and overcome the obstacles that haunt you!

name: Discin
description: Discin is about throwing the disc in the basket. Experience the beauty of flight as you explore our custom-crafted disc golf courses. DISCIN currently features 3 unique courses and 4 discs with varied flight characteristics.

name: Daydreamer
description: Daydreamer: An action-adventure RPG game where you dream away your classes to explore an action-packed world of adventure made from the topics surrounding you. Your brain is the limit! so go and have fun!

name: Crystal Horizons
description: Lead your band of sky pirates on a tactical adventure across the floating islands of Sazdemir! A Tactics RPG inspired by legends of old, with fresh new ideas. Build your crew from a variety of unique and technical classes, master Elemental Reactions on the field, and execute masterful strategies!

name: Cricket Heroes: VR
description: Step into the exhilarating world of cricket with VR Cricket Heroes! Whether you're a die-hard cricket fan or a casual gamer, we've got all the action you crave. From thrilling super overs to intense test matches, and the prestigious World Cup, our game offers it all.

name: Abandoned
description:
Abandoned is a psychological thriller set in a universe created by Headshot Interactive.
You play as a security officer aboard a space station. Your mission: Search for alien life forms and make contact with them.

name: Henry's Forgotten Performance
description: Explore the abandoned theater, solve interesting puzzles to move forward, uncover the horrifying truth about Henry and find what you've been looking for. but know that you are not alone, and they can find you at any moment.

name: Time Travel Cafe
description: Alchemy type cooking sim about Malin and her mom who were sent to the past by their newly bought cafe ♡

name: Roboloop
description: The puzzle game where you program a loop of commands to help a pair of robots navigate a factory floor

name: Police on Duty 2
description: Prepare yourself to enforce the law and preserve tranquility in Police on Duty 2.

name: Cat Girl Survivor
description: "Cat Girl Survivor" is a dot graphic berserker-like game featuring a variety of unique characters and colorful skills. Defend the world of cat girls with a variety of charming characters!

name: Chromatrix
description: Defend against waves of unique enemies in this old-school tower defense game, where colors are your key to victory.

name: Mancers of Magic
description: Mancers of Magic is a Spell-based Shooter where you must fight your way through islands of monsters to become the ultimate Mancer!

name: Craft Wars
description: Enter the adrenaline-fueled world of "Craft Wars," a VR multiplayer shooter for up to 16 players. With the power to craft every detail of your weapon using 3D pixel blocks, unleash your creativity and dominate the battlefield with your unique arsenal.

name: Street Wise: A Teenager's Story
description: Orphan is a raw and unflinching life simulator that throws you into the shoes of a teenager facing a difficult family life. Navigate the emotional rollercoaster of a fractured home while juggling the pressures of school, friendships, and carving your own path in the world.

name: Russian CyberVillage Simulator
description: Develop a village colony on Mars, using various resources and bringing the unique flavor of Russian culture to the distant space.

name: Melan
description: In Melan, the player as An will go everywhere and collect memories, thereby revealing some of what is happening in the game. The game is built in a storytelling format with situations that the player gradually discovers through interacting with the environment and NPCs.

name: Eureka! Superconductor Lab
description: Eureka! Superconductor Lab is a crafting+simulation game where you synthesize materials and witness the astonishing scientific phenomena. Work alongside scholars, science geeks, and your girlfriend to synthesize the Holy Grail of modern physics: a room-temperature superconductor!

name: Secret of the Deep
description: Uncover the Secret of the Deep and face the evil beneath, whispering your name. Fight for hope for those deemed lost, and discover your past. Become a hero in this action adventure with a unique blend of RPG elements, hack’n’slash combat, resource management, and a gripping story!

name: El-Drifto
description: The game aims is to drive, and drift your car in the city. You can also jumps on the wall and to do flips. Earn money by drifting and doing flips without flipping the car on the roof. Level up and buy new wheels, turbo and cars with your money and customize your car colour for your own pleasure.

name: Mineval
description: MinegamerFrance presents Mineval, a free-to-play survival game! This game is in the 3rd person, a specific goal and to survive with all the necessary means, which will be on the Mineval map. This game will listen to the community and do its utmost to record as much demand as possible!

name: Snow Blower: Idle Game
description: Snow Blower - Idle Game is a Free to Play game where you'll blow away snow, employ helper robots, unlock upgrades, complete tasks and goals and much more.

name: Science Soldier
description: "Science Soldier" is an indie action and shooting game with an isometric view, focused on a linear space adventure. Face tactical challenges and alien enemies through varied scenarios, advancing through an intriguing science fiction storyline.

name: Planet Surf
description: In this 3D precision platformer, you become a slippery penguin who must waddle through a strange world, filled with many penguin challenges. If you struggle to move mouse good you will become sad penguin. Bounce, surf, and fly through the air at high speeds to unlock maximum penguin potential. (^O^)

name: Undusted: Letters from the Past
description: Undusted: Letters from the Past is a casual game focused on restoring dirty items to their pristine state. Use a variety of tools to return objects to their original appearance. As you clean each item belonging to the protagonist, reflect on the significance and stories behind them.

name: Undefeatable
description: Accurate gunplay, high-speed movement with lots of expression, and character customization. What more could you want in an arena shooter, and what more does it take to become undefeatable?

name: Wishlands Defence
description: Wishlands Defence is a deckbuilding tower defence game. Collect resources and craft defence towers. Protect the cute villagers from the enemy attacks.

name: Word Sylla
description: Hexa Word Sylla Word Submit Puzzle offers a dynamic gameplay experience that will keep you hooked for hours. Delve into the depths of your vocabulary and logic skills as you unravel syllabic mysteries and unlock the full potential of the English language.

name: YAYS: Your Adventure Your Story
description: Fantasy Turn-Based RPG. Make group of 1-4 characters and wander across world with rich lore, that you can fill by your imagination. The world that is never the same thanks to randomise mechanism. Every player has own story and unique experience. It is Your Adventure and Your Story! YAYS

name: World's Goodest Pup
description: A cozy roguelike deckbuilder where you enter dog shows! Collect new tricks, groom for stats, unlock breeds, and accessorize at shops as you make your way to the top dog podium. Fluffy, heartwarming runs await in World's Goodest Pup!

name: Zaque's Game
description: A strategy, survival, horror game in which you play a card game against a serial killer. Take turns placing cards, watch out for matches and face cards, slap faster than your opponent and steal the whole deck!

name: Twin Cam Turbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghurka
description: Sin descripción

name: Xerxes
description: Sin descripción

name: Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fantasy Restored & Rebalanced
description: Restored & Rebalanced is a bugfix and rebalance hack for the original, NES Final Fantasy that aims at fixing the game's notorious bugs, adding several quality of life features and smoothing over the game's difficulty curve, as well as adding some bonus postgame content.

name: Divine Rush
description: Divine Rush is a battle royale platform game for up to 16 players. The game is about outsmarting the rivals using shooting, hooking, or trapping tactics, collecting diamonds, and earning upgrades.

name: Falling Stars... And Other Celestial Objects
description: Design the perfect defence system for the city in this physics-based game. Stop the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals and more! 60+ levels that will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

name: Everwayne
description: Embark on a journey through the fading world of Everwane, unravel all of its secrets, untangle the personal stories of characters, collect various unique cards for each character, and battle your enemies.

name: Pup Champs
description: A tactical puzzle game about leading a football team of cute dogs! Solve puzzles, score goals and become the champions!

name: Hypnomemoria
description: Oliver got a chance to receive therapy in one of the greatest psychiatric clinics. However, for that he’ll have to try a new experimental type of treatment. Will that therapy heal him or leave a bigger wound?

name: Lumos
description: Galactic Labyrinth = Navigating Planetary Portals"

name: RetroSpace
description: Drive through futuristic maps on distant planets. Enjoy the endless drive on different planets while listening to retro music!

name: Warfare Ultimatum
description: Modern FPS/RTS hybrid, Large-scale battles from the depth of the sea all the way to space! Either play the standard 64-player non-stop battle using Air/Land/Sea vehicles or drop in a thriller, long game of Diplomacy Warfare, experience sabotage, betrayal, war crime, organized operations and more

name: Hen Town
description: Hen Town is a rogue-like game, you are a female knight battles monsters, protects village restoring light and hope.

name: Doppel Diner
description: In an alternate 1950s universe, there is a small spaceship diner, where the position of the orbit determines its interior environment. Explore three distinct gameplay challenges that metaphorically represent the real euthymic, manic, and depressive mood episodes of bipolar disorder.

name: Echoes of Elysium
description: An aerial exploration and survival game, set in the procedural world of Elysium. Fire up the engines and take to the skies in your hand-crafted fleet of airships. Mechanical wonders clash with ancient mysteries in an untamed paradise.

name: Wild in the West
description: Outcast by a frontier town, a mysterious gunslinger becomes their last hope against a ruthless robot invasion. Bullets fly, and gears grind in this epic Wild West vs. sci-fi showdown. Will classic grit prevail?

name: Joe Maverick: Legend of the Savior
description: Venture into medieval times to fulfil an ancient prophecy! Featuring a well-crafted world, a zany cast of characters, and turn-based combat, gather your wits to uncover the truth behind the world you explore in this JRPG adventure.

name: Snail Juice
description: Reminiscent of Abe's Odyssey and Rayman. Journey through challenging levels to rescue snail friends trapped in a juice factory, facing off against relentless robots and security guards. Trade lives for cash, equip yourself with bombs and ammunition to conquer obstacles and snack on junk food.

name: Sandtable Engine
description: Welcome to the sandbox world full of creativity! With a free and open gameplay mode and a creative platform, whether you are a player or a developer, you can find highly scalable gameplay and game modes, or DIY your own game ideas here!

name: Game is Full of Bugs
description: Game is Full of Bugs is a game about a crafty programmer fighting an alien invasion of bugs by building a magazine of bullets like a deck of cards.

name: Vuntra City
description: An immersive city exploration game where every building can be entered. Explore a vast procedural city, meet its inhabitants, and gain access to exclusive locations with breathtaking views.

name: Duckified: Cosmic Legends
description: Duckified: Cosmic Legends is meant to be a fast paced game all about the multiverse, with a whole lot of ducks!

name: Conquest of Kings
description: Dive into fast-paced, deep-level turn-based strategy! Compete for Sacred Sites, recruit units, play powerful cards, conquer strategic tiles, and forge alliances with cunning diplomacy... only to shatter them when necessary - for in this realm, only one can claim the throne!

name: Baa! Never Stop Bleating
description: Baa! Get ready for an exhilarating Roguelike adventure! Whether you go solo or invite your friends, use randomly generated objects to construct a sturdy home to shield your little ones from the dangers in the forest. Start building your family now and prove the power of the sheep! Baa!

name: Cats vs. Aliens
description: Aliens have come to The Planet! Fight, gather, build, recruit, and conquer in this casually fresh take on familiar base building and bullet heaven mechanics. WARNING: Animal pun quantity may exceed the daily recommended limit.

name: Heroes For Hire
description: You've joined a guild before, right? So, where's the trouble in managing a guild of your own, too? Guide your heroes, raid some dungeons, and grow your guild to rise from the bottom of the ranks right up to the top in Heroes for Hire!

name: Power Quest Survivors
description: Power Quest Survivors is a challenging bullet hell game where players face relentless waves of enemies. Through strategic gameplay and skillful evasion, players earn experience points to unlock new abilities, enhancing their chances of survival in this unforgiving fantasy world

name: Shapefall
description: Engage in a unique cooperative FPS with up to three allies. Defend against endless enemies by utilizing weapons that fire 3D shapes. Match ammo shapes and colors to maximize damage and unlock perks. Explore ruins, solve puzzles, and discover easter eggs to enhance your strategic play.

name: Animal Way
description: Animal Way is a topdown, cozy farm-like simulation game. Explore a serene island, craft and build, make the island yours.

name: Stealth Gun
description: A fun shooter where EVERYONE IS INVISIBLE by default! Use various mechanics to locate other players, and play different game modes with your friends or in public lobbies.

name: Too Far Too Late
description: Embark on a Colony in Space. Build a base to ensure your colonists survive. Explore, mine resources, craft items, and thrive in a realistic atmospheric and electrical simulation. Watch out for potential dangers before it’s too late!

name: Sunset Devils
description: Sunset Devils is a top-down action shooter, Where every weapon's unique controls must be mastered through the thrill of an old west gunfight. A classic spaghetti western story of vengeance, portrayed in stylish pixel art.

name: Greatest Dungeon
description: Soulslike PvPvE medieval Dungeon-crawler, with extraction possibility and incoming zone. The Combat is Physicbased and has dismemberment, higher speed-stats of yours slowdown enemy's, and projectiles, you can find rare Items or NPCs in the Dungeon that give you Quests or fight Bosses.

name: Soulrise
description: Soulrise is a challenging precision platformer that can be played alone or with up to three friends. As you climb a tower, you determine the angle and power of your jumps. Be careful... One mistake and your progress is set back by an unpleasant fall!

name: Primavera Lihbor
description: Primavera LIHBOR is a story-driven, first-person 3d adventure focused on exploration and riddle solving with occasional encounters with hostile entities from other worlds.

name: A Slightly Different Backrooms
description: A slightly different Backrooms is a Coop or Singleplayer Horror Puzzle Game. Encounter different Monsters and Levels than in the other Backrooms, but brace yourself for the same bone-chilling atmosphere like the typical ones.

name: Revenge Request
description: Revenge Request is a Tactical, FPS, Roguelite set in a modern day world. Pick from multiple different classes with their own unique weapons and abilities. Combine skill and equipment in various ways to experience diverse gameplay.

name: Hope Timbre
description: Solve puzzles using insect-like traversal skills through imaginary realm, in which there is no up or down. Guide mysterious creature, manipulate the architecture and find hope instruments. After you wake up, use them to heal the world and escape never-ending cycle!

name: Battle Royale with Cheese
description: "Battle Royale with Cheese": a modern battlefield, 20 teams of three, and pure strategic mayhem. Scavenge for weapons and stay stocked on supplies. Victory belongs to the boldest squads.

name: Primeval Horizon
description: Start your own journey in a primeval open world, facing survival challenges alongside other inhabitants as you strive to thrive and evolve, conquering bosses and augmenting your creature along the way.

name: Blocks!
description: BLOCKS! is a virtual sandbox that lets you create anything you can imagine - in immersive, user-generated 3D worlds. There aren't any predefined aims or goals.

name: Spirit Possession
description: A 2D horizontal platform game that transforms into an enemy and solves puzzles.

name: Enter Falconry
description: Enter Falconry immerses you in the captivating world of Arabian falconry, where dedicated falconers train and nurture their majestic birds of prey. Forge strong bonds with your avian companions, train them diligently, expand your collection, compete, and connect with the world's foremost trainers.

name: Rager
description: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-fueled excitement of this melee combat rhythm game! Master weapon of your choice – sword, mace, claws, hammer, axe, your own fists and many more! Stunning visuals and spatial audio technology puts you right in heart of the action.

name: Surfers Code
description: 3D open world tropical adventure and surfing simulation. Immerse yourself in this chill environment with quirky characters and challenging surfing. Unveil the mysteries tucked away in every corner of the islands.

name: Souvenir
description: The 54-year-old protagonist, living solely on memories from the past 10 years, undergoes a year of hypnotherapy with a psychiatrist to recover lost memories from 44 years ago. On January 14th, with no significant progress in the therapy, he encounters ruins and a young girl during hypnosis.

name: Job Interview
description: "Job Interview" is a game that utilizes conversation-based artificial intelligence (AI) to simulate real interview experiences. It's perfect for those exploring new career paths, seeking to gain interview experience, or simply looking to improve their interview skills while having fun.

name: Dreadwoods Gatekeeper
description: A narrative horror mystery game in which you take the role of a new gatekeeper in a small town with a rumor of a monster in the forest. Manage the gate, interact with townsfolk, make decisions, and patrol around the town.

name: Unrest
description: Choose your side in the futuristic struggle between colonist humans and resistant alien creatures. Prove who is superior in adrenaline-filled space battles with a unique gameplay experience!

name: Nautical Survival
description: Captain an armed sea vessel to fight hordes of oceanic terrors! Upgrade your seacraft, equip it with weapons and hire crew members to your aid.​

name: The Crimson Lyre
description: The Crimson Lyre is an immersive first person RPG adventure into a dangerous fantasy land.

name: Jump On Clouds
description: Jump on Clouds is a chill game where you jump on clouds! Jump on different clouds in different environments.

name: BoundWorlds
description: BoundWorlds is a multiverse-exploring action-RPG with an immensely powerful world editor. Explore an infinite expanse of player-created worlds, create your own levels and adventures, and create gateways to link these worlds together into a single cohesive multiverse!

name: Inspiring Dreams
description: A man becomes a ghost after a deadly accident. Full of regrets, he will stay alongside his wife, who cannot see him, and protect her all her life from an unknown evil, sharing her best and worst moments. So close yet so far. A story-driven experience full of mystery and poetry.

name: Dreadwoods Gatekeeper: Prologue
description: A narrative horror mystery game in which you take the role of an old gatekeeper in a small town just as things start to go astray. Manage the gate, interact with the townsfolk, make decisions, and patrol the town.

name: Dinner Defenders
description: Protect your campfire cooking in Dinner Defenders, a roguelike tower defense game. Summon units and utilize combination of their skills and synergies to fend off the hungry goblins and orcs. Survive, and finally have your well-deserved meal in the middle of forest!

name: Attribute2
description: A multiplayer fun and casual third person versus game.You can not only kill your opponents with the weapons,but also modify the properties of almost all objects in the map to improve your chances of winning.This game offers custom maps, gameplay,and props.It also has a shop for you to upgrade.

name: Spectral Synergy
description: Embark on a dual-realm RPG odyssey in "Spectral Synergy" Master blade and magic, solve puzzles, and unravel a tale of balance between light and dark. Every choice alters your path in this 3D action roguelike adventure.

name: The Elder Gods
description: "The Elder Gods" is a dark card-based adventure inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft. It's an roguelike deckbuilder with a unique sanity-mechanic.

name: Fort Boyard: Les défis du père Fouras
description: Sin descripción

name: Tail Concerto Battle
description: Tail Concerto Battle is a fan-made fighting game based on CyberConnect2's Tail Concerto, made in the 2D Fighting Maker 2nd. engine. The game features prominent characters from Tail Concerto, alongside guest characters Klonoa and Ran-oh.

name: Project 37
description: Project 37 is a multi-front, combat-focused RTS with a unique lane-based control scheme. Units move with more autonomy, but you'll have to fight on multiple parts of the map simultaneously. Crush your enemy with commando raids, mine fields, vehicle-crushing tanks, hacked defenses, and teleporters.

name: Shuihu Zhuan Zhi Qunmo Fengyun Lu
description: A port of Chuanpu's Mega Drive strategy RPG "Shui Hu Zhuan"

name: Deluxe Flame Party Pack
description: A collection of Twitch based games that streamers can play with their chat live on Twitch. The chat plays by typing in chat.

name: PC Simulator
description: Buy components and assemble your computer!

name: Dead Fibers
description: A deadly virus has transformed the majority of the global population into relentless, ravenous zombie-like monsters called "Fibers", leaving only a scattered few survivors clinging to hope in isolated pockets of civilization.

name: Azure '88
description: Azure '88 is a fast-paced 2D platformer game with a roller-skating-based movement system. Explore the economically and socially broken Earth in the year 2088, where our main protagonist desperately wants to escape by getting into a space shuttle to prosperous Mars that leaves once a decade.

name: Witchmarsh: Tea Party of the Damned
description: Create and lead a team of four investigators in this action RPG set in Jazz Age New England.

name: House of 1000 Traps
description: While carrying out your usual heist, you end up locked in a house filled to the roof with traps with a serial killer ready to stab you in the neck with his butcher knife. Be stealthy and get what you came here for, and find a way out!

name: Goblin Quest: Completed Edition
description: Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline. From playing the hero who saves the lands to the villain who destroys it, the world will adapt and respond to your actions. You decide your fate.

name: Yokai Tales: Fox
description: Yokai Tales: Fox is a deep action RPG that tests your discipline, resilience, and skill in agility and combat. Embody the last Kitsune, on her quest to save spirits from the cruelty of humans. Rebuild their lives, learn unique techniques, and ascend to a Nine-Tailed God.

name: lone.AI
description: lone.AI is an upcoming space RPG roguelike. With difficult, relentless gameplay, each run has the potential to increase your ship's power, speed, and more. Explore the solar system and find out the secret behind the ZOSMA, an alien race that holds power over the system.

name: Worst Idea
description: A 2D platformer where two arms trading companies are fighting in the city of the future due to competition. You are hired as an agent who has to follow all orders and serve the interests of the company for money and a place in it.

name: Nerdtastic Norman & The Soul Fragments
description: Nerdtastic Norman is a 2d scrolling puzzle platformer set in purgatory based on Dante's Inferno. Over 70 unique levels, dangerously hard boss battles, and 1 unique story. Help Norman gather the missing pieces of his shattered soul, and help him return to the land of the living.

name: Polar Pathways
description: Embark on a heartwarming journey as a lil' penguin tryin to find his way back to his community. Explore the polar pathways and icey caves at your own pace. Find your colony of penguins you've lost after a disastrous avalanche and get back home!

name: The Horror at Highrook
description: The Horror at Highrook is an occult card crafting RPG. Explore a haunted mansion with your team of investigators, summon dark entities, craft powerful protections, uncover the fate of the missing family, and choose your own path through the darkness.

name: The Tower Stories Green 1
description: In a magical universe adorned with colorful characters from various races, we invite you to a visual novel adventure that will lead you to different endings. Define your own path in this captivating fantasy world and set sail on an unforgettable journey.

name: Fear: Ghosts of the Past
description: The old mansion. You climb into it in search of hidden gold. But what is that sound? The creak of old floorboards. The sound becomes clearer. Someone's coming!

name: Path of Ambition: The Sun Rise
description: Path of Ambition is a story-rich, choice-matter RPG set in an open world inspired by Dungeons & Dragons. Begin as a humble ranger to become a lord, a business magnate, a benevolent healer, or maintain your noble spirit as a folk hero. Shape your destiny in a realm teeming with monsters and legends.

name: Happy Monster
description: "Happy Monster" is a roguelike game themed around dragons and Cthulhu monsters. Players control a small monster, fighting through an alien world filled with monsters. Survive, grow stronger, and explore to unlock new forms, gain power, and uncover ways to defeat the monsters.

name: Text Adventure Engine: Chicken Boy
description: Explore the world of Chicken Boy, for DOS...

name: Text Adventure Engine
description: Explore the digital realm of DOS in this retro game engine, with heroes like Chicken Boy! Or create your very own text-based DOS adventures.

name: Spellforged
description: Forge your magical journey through the world of Syntheria in this action, adventure, Metroidvania.

name: Axe Ghost
description: In Axe Ghost you play cards to battle an advancing monster horde in turn-based spatial combat. Manipulate enemy positions, group monsters for high scores, and face off against the loathsome Garnemar!

name: Pounce and the Twin Trees
description: Unleash your inner tiger! Pounce through a vibrant world & its mirrored corruption in this challenging metroidvania. Master agility, traverse shifting landscapes & outrun danger. Can you unlock the Twin Trees' secrets & save the day? Wishlist now! #platformer #adventure

name: Price for Freedom: Gold and Sand
description: Gold and Sand is an erotic-CRPG with turn-based combat. Beautiful hand drawn art elevates this character driven game where you will explore the unique world and guide characters as they discover each other and themselves in fully animated erotic scenes.

name: Paintballers: MLPB 2024
description: Welcome to Paintballers MLPB 2024, a cross-platform video game meticulously designed by professional paintball players. Whether you're a seasoned enthusiast or a newcomer, Paintballers delivers an authentic and thrilling paintball experience like never before.

name: Dice-Zee!: Duels
description: Dice-Zee! DUELS adds a whole new dimension to this classic dice rolling game! Now you'll not just be trying to achieve a high score, but you'll be trying to survive epic old school RPG battles against AI opponents as well as fierce fantasy beasts such as fire golems and majestic dragons!

name: Project Vic 2
description: Despite all the warnings, you are not afraid to enter the old Hastings Mansion. You put up with supernatural encounters to explore another of your beloved lost places. Once there, you discover things you never thought possible.

name: Jump Up Champion!
description: Jump Up Champion! is an exciting and challenging game that puts your jumping skills to the test.

name: Spirit Realm Saga
description: Spirit Realm Saga is an indie game that combines elements of role-playing, Roguelike, strategy, simulation, tower-defense, and puzzle-solving. It offers players a challenging and explorative game world with a mix of different gameplay mechanics.

name: Spellslinger Towns
description: Embrace the power of sorcery through deckbuilding, master the art of city-building, and chart your own path to glory in Spellslinger Towns. Lose yourself in a sandbox-like realm where magic is real, and the possibilities are limitless.

name: Quantum Conquest
description: Conquer the battlefield in Quantum Conquest! Outwit opponents by strategically placing Tokens, engaging in intense combat, and fortifying your position with unique Forts. Explore diverse gameplay options that challenge your tactical skills. Are you prepared for the ultimate turn-based showdown?

name: Revolocity
description: With its vibrant visuals, addictive gameplay, and dynamic progression system, Revolocity offers an exhilarating experience that will keep you coming back for more. How long can you endure the chaos of space? Find out in Revolocity, where velocity meets revolution!

name: Human Resource
description: Navigate through the corridors of corporate tyranny using only your keyboard skills. Unleash your vengeance upon the oppressive office management as you flip, dodge, and dash through cubicles and meeting rooms. Fast-paced adrenaline arcade.

name: St. Maria Village
description: This is a romantic furry visual novel. Interact with the girls, explore beautiful places and find the way to cure your childhood friend!

name: Forgotten Vale
description: Build, Research, Survive, Expand. This town-building strategy game will envelop you in a world of progress, logistics, efficiency, resources & needs as you fight to prepare for winter and unlock the secrets of this deceptively cheerful wilderness.

name: Forest Journeys
description: Embark on an enchanting adventure into the heart of the Giant Ancient Forest in Forest Journeys. Immerse yourself in a lush world teeming with hidden wonders.

name: Lucido Cancels Everything
description: LUCIDO Cancels Everything, the newschool Arcade Beat 'Em Up. With cute w**d smoking angels. Help to free Cyberphonk City of the evil cultists! 100% fact checked and Illuminati approved. ルーチードー

name: Kebabstar
description: From desert to stars! Craft your path to fame with Kebabstar! From desert hardships to star-studded parties, become a social media phenomenon by mastering the art of kebab-making and outshining your enemies.

name: Relo
description: Solve problems with the best tool there is: Trains.

name: Starforge
description: A riveting space survival adventure. Stranded on a hostile planet, scavenge resources, craft tools, and navigate dangers. Explore a vast, procedurally generated universe, forge alliances, and confront the mysteries of deep space. Will you conquer the cosmos or succumb to its perils?

name: Everlords
description: Everlords combines the elements of real-time strategy and base management. As a mighty Everlord, you possess the godlike power to create worlds, harness the elements, and guide your devoted followers in the battle against the advancing chaos forces.

name: Millennium Arcade
description: Embark on a journey through the memory of a millennial in this arcade platform full of small indie games inspired by the golden age of entertainment.

name: Steel Effigy
description: Fight against a horde of soulless machines in this 1 to 4 player action-roguelite, hack n slash. Wield several combat defining weapons simultaneously and imbue them with elemental augments to enhance their power. Create unique builds by collecting and using powerful items to devastating effect.

name: Cassette
description: Cassette – Analog Horror, where you have to conduct a mysterious and little-known in its circles investigation, which is covered with a huge layer of dust and secrets. No one in the late 20th century has yet discovered the truth in the investigation.

name: Kloppyssimo
description: An experimental game focused on exploring different ways to create procedural music. Place various musical entities and learn how to use them through simple puzzles. Customize and expand your Hub with the "Kloppies" to discover new Levels and unlock more musical parts.

name: Twisted Waters
description: Fulfill your dream of being able to control water in real life in this first-person action-adventure. Embark on a personal journey with the main character navigating her new skill in a beautiful world. At least that is what it was before conflict entered it…

name: Mage Hunt: Spellshifter
description: Dark fantasy action rpg, rogue/souls inspired, with both unique, story driven and proceduraly generated, living, changing world, clash of magic and technology - mage punk, horror themed, slay hordes of dreadful creatures, knockdown the tallest of giants, hunt mutated mages, become the nightmare.

name: Secret Forest
description: Discover a vibrant realm brimming with wonders, where incredible races come to life. Master a unique combat system and challenge epic foes in your quest for glory.

name: Serega Madness Pixel Adventures
description: Serega Madness Pixel Adventures — is a single player horror adventure game set in a pixel world. Solve interesting puzzles while hiding from the insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.

name: Racing Stars
description: Fasten your seat belts and buckle up for a turbo-charged adventure in this zany cartoon car racing game - Rasing Stars !!!

name: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons
description: Legends of Dragaea: Idle Dungeons is a First Person Idle Dungeon Crawler game with 6 unique races to choose, robust combat, a grand saga spanning a continent full of unique kingdoms, free-form skill system, and a guild management system to master as you uncover the secrets of the world of Dragaea!

name: Infinicity
description: This little sandbox game generates gigabytes of procedural city, traffic and world around you as you move.

name: Luminastadt
description: It's a cosy colony simulation game. Build and expand your colony by designing buildings, roads and infrastructure. Manage resources such as food, water and building materials. Manage housing, healthcare and education to keep your population happy and productive.

name: Monster Island
description: An adventure game styled as a roguelike pet training game. Here, you can tame over 130 unique monster pets, unlock their exclusive skills, and assist you in your adventure. Constantly challenge yourself, unlock more exciting content, and explore this world filled with fantasy and adventure.

name: Terra
description: Terra is an atmospheric real-time strategy game that combines 4X elements with a procedural universe. Wage war, engage in diplomacy, and discover hidden characters and the mysteries of the universe through the eyes of one of 5 unique factions.

name: Buzz or Die
description: If you win, you are acquitted; if you lose, you are executed. Death row inmates compete for ratings and talk battle in the conversation deck!

name: The Destiny Of Nagari
description: Embark on an epic adventure to become the greatest magician ever! Master the elements - water, fire, air, and earth. Explore magical worlds and use the diary of the last magician king to protect your kingdom from monsters. Are you ready to unleash your powers and save your realm?

name: The Real Faces of Vtuber
description: In this murder committed in a VTuber agency, the identity of the Nakanohito is key to cracking the case.

name: Traitor's Gambit
description: "Traitor's Gambit" is a gripping multiplayer shooter filled with deception and suspense. Players take on roles like Innocents, Detectives, or Traitors, navigating diverse maps. With unique roles, expansive maps, and thrilling rounds, each game promises an unpredictable and dynamic experience.

name: Baseline
description: BALLERS ELITE combines nostalgia with modern technology. The gameplay is like Rocket League & NBA Street both went in on a test tube baby!

name: Football Manager Lifestyle 24
description: Can you balance football management and life simulation? Football Manager Lifestyle 24 uniquely blends both, Guide your club to glory and pursue personal ventures to become a lifestyle icon. Grow your club, manage fishing and farming businesses, make friends, and win trophies in this dynamic world.

name: Idle Meteor
description: Cycle through phases of extinction, expansion, and exploration in an idle game where you play as a god who wants to establish a civilization in a hostile world where meteors fall almost as often as rain.

name: Unscripted Fate
description: The protagonist is Alex, who comes from a poor family and by this reason, from an innocent child ends up being part of a criminal organization from a young age.

name: Lands of Koastalia
description: Lands of Koastalia is a relaxing city building game with a unique building system. As Mayor, your primary mission is to keep people happy. Craft natural-looking villages, manage resources within and across them, explore an island, and meet the needs of your residents.

name: To Build a Home
description: To Build a Home is a 2D life simulation game. Inspired in equal parts in The Sims and Dwarf Fortress, the simplified graphics hide a complex AI and deep interactions between characters and objects, the perfect environment for rich emergent behaviour.

name: Kill The Clock
description: Enter mid-1900s Europe on a quest for revenge, only to find your nemesis murdered. Framed for the crime, unravel the mystery with RPG elements, offering various choices to crack the case. With each playthrough, uncover new killers and methods. Can you clear your name before it's too late?

name: Item Collector Ball
description: You're a ball that collects items! Explore this carefully crafted time trial platformer with a plethora of unique physics based obstacles. Unique music and retro aesthetic define this game and provide a relaxing and satisfying experience. Easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Code: Sentinel
description: In this cyberpunk FPS, players navigate a dystopian city corrupted by a malevolent computer virus. You, armed with weapons and skills, unravels the secrets behind CyberCorp's experiments.

name: Vertical Fighters
description: Vertical Fighters is a top-down shooter with a tactical Rock-Paper-Scissors twist! Play as 4 unique classes that hard-counter each other, experiencing moments of exhilarating counter-play, fun cooperation and fiendish treachery. Customise your variants, camos and pilots for maximum skill expression!

name: Chef's Adventure
description: You are a chef on the hunt for chickens, which have what you need: Fresh eggs! (Demo does not include eggs). Find the chickens, gain new skills and explore the different levels of: Chef's Adventure

name: Go Rollo Go
description: RIP, REPLACE, REARRANGE, ROTATE and ROLL on a vibrant high-velocity adventure to Craft the Ultimate Smoothie and Restore The Multiverse you Wrecked.

name: Jetsam!
description: Jetsam! is an action-packed jetski racing game in which players compete in intense races across dynamic and visually stunning environments.

name: Code Name: Unstable
description: Engage in thrilling space battles against a variety of formidable bosses, each with unique abilities and strategies. With every victory, unlock powerful upgrades to enhance your ship's weapons, defenses, and special abilities.

name: Assasin Top Down
description: Assassin Top Down is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled assassin on a mission to eliminate guards without being detected.

name: Death Pilot
description: Immerse yourself in the mind of a lone clone, created by an abandoned factory with an inexplicable mission: conquer a desolate planet. Uncover the mystery of your existence as you explore a world littered with the remains of failed clones, questioning your purpose and sanity.

name: Fusionsmith
description: Delve deep underground, fill your bags with precious metals and forge your way through in this action packed roguelike featuring unique spin on crafting your gear.

name: Little Army Manager
description: Build and customize your army to battle against waves of enemies. Strategize and use spells to outsmart your foes. Upgrade your units and power to ensure victory. Simple to play, yet full of depth and challenge.

name: Chordioid
description: Chordioid is a unique musical JRPG where you battle to the beat. Explore a strange world, make unlikely friends, and uncover dark secrets, all while the beat goes on.

name: Forty-Niner
description: Immerse yourself in a survival and exploration game set in a procedural Wild West world. Choose your role, and set out to prove your legend on the frontier by building, mining, and battling alone or with friends.

name: Runa
description: An indie adventure inspired by JRPG classics, with turn-based battle system, social links and a story-rich science fantasy world.

name: Cordyceps Island
description: Survive against an infinite wave of the infected that seems to only grow faster & stronger.

name: LTA: Light-years! Thrusters! Action!
description: LTA: Light-years! Thrusters! Action! - A space roguelite game about adventures, loyal crews and a multitude of amazing stories in the depths of the galaxy. Sources of inspiration for this game: The sense of freedom and adventure from Pirates! by Sid Meier, crazy stories from Rimworld...

name: Twilight Epoch
description: A science-fantasy action-RPG, taking a party of characters on a story-rich journey through a universe in it's dying breath.

name: SoundKilla
description: SoundKilla a game steeped in Caribbean Sound Clash culture. Succeed by collecting dubplates, mastering DJ skills and conquering formidable bosses. Set against a backdrop of cityscapes and tropical islands, this game offers a unique blend of music, strategy and storytelling from start to finish.

name: Trillenium
description: In the year 2999, art is on the brink of extinction by AI. Within 3 Days, unite the few remaining artists together to end AI's monopoly on society once and for all. Trillenium is a bite-sized 2D RPG created by artists, for artists, and reminds us that to lose art is to lose humanity itself.

name: Chaotic Good Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Many Mini Typing Games
description: Chase high scores in a series of breakneck typing minigames! Keep up with keyboard-mashing cats, banana-wielding monkey-cowboys and more as you "QWERTY" your way to new heights!

name: Ostera: The curse of...
description: Welcome to Ostera: The curse of... Your subjects are waiting for you to save your village from a looming curse.

name: Metro Outbreak
description: In Subway Outbreak, defend and rebuild your metro station against mutant hordes in this pixel strategy game. Manage tasks like fortifying defenses, launching assaults, and gathering resources to survive 30 days of increasingly fierce attacks. Lose by death or generator destruction.

name: Enlisted: Reinforced - Deluxe Pack
description: This Pack includes: A premium squad consisting of 4 machine gunners and 1 engineer of level 4, armed with Colt Monitor machine gun;A premium M8 A1 GMC tank;A premium squad consisting of 4 tankers of level 4;Unique portrait.

name: Enlisted: Reinforced - Advanced Pack
description: This Pack includes: A premium squad consisting of 4 machine gunners and 1 engineer of level 4, armed with MG 13 machine gun;A premium Pz.Sfl. Ic tank;A premium squad consisting of 3 tankers of level 4.

name: Backpack Quest: Battles And Adventures
description: Manage your backpack inventory in this auto battler and achieve the best synergies. Three different game modes (pve and pvp), mid-fight activatable skills and environmental rules. Check your opponent's build and customize the roundly Drafting Shop and shift the odds in your favor!

name: Happy Birthday
description: You will play as a simple and brave little girl, relax at your own pace, interact with the friendly people of Moon Valley, experience adventures through life and death, and finally return to the warmth of home for birthdays and Christmas!

name: RPG non RPG: Valhalla
description: Dive into "RPG non RPG: Valhalla", an action RPG, adventure, and casual genre blend. Explore the mystical realms of Valhalla, uncovering secrets in ancient dungeons. Choose your class for unique abilities. Engage in strategic gameplay and immerse yourself in a Norse-inspired world.

name: Citadel's Keeper
description: Protect your cities against waves of enemies. Manage your resources and plan accordingly to develop your city and armies to survive!

name: Re:Awaken
description: Purify negativity from the afterlife and bring together the children of fate! Swear oaths to divine beasts and wield powerful twilight abilities in this anime inspired roguelite adventure.

name: Royal Decree!
description: Inspired by boardgames and roguelike deckbuilders, we crafted a unique single-player strategy card game. Craft your deck, resolve events and crises, enact royal decrees, all while fighting to stave off the collapse of your kingdom and legacy.

name: Shadows of Destruction
description: Deep in the Land of Honshu where ancient traditions and dark secrets converge. In this side-scrolling adventure, you'll wields the swords of Ryota, a betrayed samurai, and his enigmatic savior, Diago. Together, they are the "Shadows of Destruction," a force forged in revenge and shrouded in mystery.

name: Kinny and the Lost Starlight
description: Kinny and the Lost Starlight is a roguelike deck-building game inspired by tic-tac-toe, where your goal is to light up the cosmos by calling stars to the board and defeating your enemies.

name: Paranormal Flipper
description: House renovation game but houses are haunted! Find cheap houses, buy, renovate, clean and sell them with a good profit. Spend your money for better equipment and bigger houses. But you need to stay sane, because most of houses are full of dangers and creepy creatures.

name: Circulation
description: Manipulate strange machines and use their mechanics to rotate the platforms around you. Create pathways by manipulating and aligning platforms. Solve the puzzles that surround you, uncover hidden paths, and strive to escape the challenging maze.

name: Nexus Wars
description: Embark on early Nexus Wars, an enthralling auto-battler set: 4970 years in the future, before the galactic calamity. Command a mech army across 9 factions with 180+ units: customizable gear and skills. Master strategic gameplay and PvP battles, laying the groundwork for an expansive PvE storyline.

name: Pieced Together
description: Pieced Together is a cozy scrapbooking game that takes you on a heartfelt journey about friendship, getting older and learning to let go.

name: Vultures
description: Vultures is a manufacturing simulation game with a capitalist twist. Build an industrial empire, play the stock market for quick loot, and flood an ever-changing economy with cheap junk to buy, bribe, or bankrupt your way to the highest perch.

name: Mausoleum of Memories
description: Mausoleum of Memories is a first-person 3D puzzle adventure game based on Egyptian Mythology. You play as the ghost of a man named Aaru who has been denied entrance to the afterlife and now must reflect on his human existence and any lessons he may have learned so he can finally rest in peace.

name: Invasion Rush
description: An apocalyptic disaster has left the door open for all kind of creatures to invade our home! Jump right into action in this hero-top down shooter-coop-roguelite experience, power up your survivors, defeat bosses and try to see how far you can get!

name: Cyber Chaos
description: play as a pew pew punk soldier and clear rooms to progress to more difficult stages.

name: Night Castle
description: Night Castle is a 2D Metroidvania game with a retro art concept. Explore an old castle inhabited by demons and ghosts and purify the darkness with light!

name: The Magus Circle
description: The Magus Circle is a survival roguelite where you are the spellcaster. Draw arcane sigils and combine powerful upgrades to dominate the endless tide of monstrosities. Join forces with mages from across the universe and uncover the secrets of these mana-hungry monsters and the Magus Circle.

name: Last Supper Of Devils
description: Last Supper of Devil is a collaborative horror game that can be played by at least 4 and up to 8 players. Players will role a Devil and attempting to reincarnate into humans through sacrificial rituals, or role a Devotee and infiltrate Devils to fight against them.

name: Die Last
description: We must revive this post-industrial world. Plant trees to earn Karma, build pipes, join Guilds, and participate in league tournaments to stay alive. Find lost objects to craft secret messages. Go rogue, wander with your dog, steal other players' Karma and grow stronger with every battle

name: Escape From The Island
description: This is a super fun game.

name: Survive The Night
description: Explore a vast world filled with hidden treasures and mysterious creatures, all while crafting powerful tools, weapons, and armor to build your fortress. Battle relentless foes, customize your character, and become the ultimate survival master. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Blu Caligo
description: Step into the shoes of a nameless exile left to die on a Mediterranean island in this first-person horror adventure. Explore an open world of haunting beauty, craft your weapons, and confront threats emerging from the depths of the island at dusk.

name: Hit the Ice
description: Instead of being a straight port, the NES Hit the Ice is a unique mix of sports and RPG (complete with leveling up and random encounters!).

name: Wily & Right no Rock Board: That's Paradise
description: Sin descripción

name: Mission Bravo
description: Sin descripción

name: Momoiro Zousan
description: Momoiro Zousan, or Johnson and Friends, is an unreleased 1994 game based on an Australian children's show of the same name.

name: Nick Faldo Championship Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Rap Quest
description: Rap Quest started life as Rap City, a game starring the one and only Vanilla Ice, who was later on replaced with "Cool Q" due to his waning popularity. The game was finished and sent in to Nintendo for approval, but was never released.

name: Jibaku-kun: Zero no Ki no Kajitsu
description: Self-Destructie: Fruit of the Zero Tree is a scrapped action-RPG based on the Jibaku-Kun manga/anime by Ami Shibata.

name: John Madden Football
description: Sin descripción

name: John Madden Football
description: John Madden Football is a port of John Madden Football '93 announced by Ubisoft in 1993 for both NES and Game Boy, but never released.

name: Grand Casino
description: Grand Casino is a gambling game that was shown (alongside Altron's Billiard Club) at Spaceworld 2000 with a release planned for that October, only to be scrapped. It eventually surfaced as part of the September 2020 Game Boy lotcheck leaks.

name: Carrera
description: A cancelled slot car racing game featuring the titular brand.

name: Austin Powers: Why Make Millions...?
description:
Austin Powers: Why Make Millions...? is an unreleased game for the Game Boy Color that was meant to be the fourth game in the series of Austin Powers for the system. Like the other games in the series, it was intended to be a mini game collection.

The prototype for the game was discovered in the September 2020 batch of the Nintendo gigaleaks.

name: Bounced
description: Unreleased Game Boy Color game from Karma Studios. A fully completed version of the game was found in 2020 among a collection of leaked Nintendo approved roms.

name: Chaos Journey
description: It is a survival and action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. This robot, which was sent from Mars to Earth to prevent the destruction of Earth after the zombie invasion, tries to save living people by fighting hordes of zombies and produce cures to save the world.

name: Arena Constellation
description: Fast Paced 3rd Person Skill Based Competitive Multiplayer Game. Arena constellation is bringing back what old competitive games have the best: The gameplay.

name: Brown Trouble
description: Brown Trouble - a 2D classic puzzle game. Control with the left mouse button, click on the pieces of pipes, turning them in the desired direction. Once you can adjust one of the pipes correctly, everything will be fine until the pipe becomes clogged again, only make the situation worse.

name: Steve: Operation Nuts
description: A strange portal appears and attracted Steve and all his beloved bolts inside, scattering them all over the universe! Embark on a colorful adventure with Steve to help him find his artifacts.

name: Can't Stand The Heat
description: Congratulations, you own a restaurant! Now just chat with customers, take orders, cook, serve, clean, design your interior and menu, order ingredients...so much to do! Earn enough cash and hire some help to make life easier. Or is it? Try to balance customer needs, employee quirks and your cashflow.

name: Mortal Hire
description: Explore new planets and civilizations. Turn in precious artifacts to the management company and get rich financially!

name: Railroad Scheduler
description: A train adventure where you avoid collisions and complete each level in the fastest time possible. With the ability to control time, you'll have the power to determine the game's speed and even go back in time to fix any mistakes and optimize the travel time for every train.

name: Hazelwood Station
description: Guide Clay on a narrative adventure to Hazelwood station, exploring everything you can along the way and making just enough money to buy your next train ticket.

name: Echoed Realms
description: Echoed Realms is a Casual Stylized Fantasy RPG focused on player experience and dynamic gameplay. Play it your way, even if that changes every day.

name: Peerless Destiny
description: "Peerless Destiny" is a fantasy 3DARPG, with exaggerated and cool fight, rich plots, and full dubbing of all game characters and creatures!

name: Mole Gem Mayhem
description: Sin descripción

name: Mystical Tactics
description: Mystical Tactics is a turn-based tactical-RPG roguelike in which you control a squad of adventurers in a mystical world. Train your heroes in fast-paced tactical battles, equip them with powerful items and lead them to repel the Dark Lord and his legions.

name: Strange Toilet
description: In the quiet neighborhood where Nathan and Sarah live, there is an ominous presence. A potential threat from a murderer on the loose. The residents did not expect that on this peaceful evening, they would be confronted with a grim reality they never anticipated.

name: Rocklings
description: Rocklings is a strategy game where you explore endless caves, strategically mining rocks to build and expand your base. Unlock upgrades to discover new technologies in a curated campaign, or unleash your creativity with a built-in level editor.

name: Wash Sim
description: Welcome to Wash Me, where every car enthusiast's dream of owning a pristine garage of meticulously maintained vehicles comes to life!

name: Home Construction Sim
description: Home Construction Sim is a fun and engaging game that lets you experience the process of building a house from start to finish.

name: My Time At Portia: Player Costume Package
description: This content requires the base game My Time at Portia on Steam in order to play.In this pack you will receive 4 alternative outfits for both the male and female playing characters.

name: Dark Spirit
description: Dark spirit is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements, where you will find yourself in the role of a vengeful ghost imprisoned in an ancient castle. Terrible secrets, dark corners and encounters with enemies - all this awaits you in this exciting adventure.

name: Survivor's Day
description: Survivor's Day is a time management adventure game in a post-apocalyptic open world setting, where you play as a scientist in a semi-abandoned area and your task is to keep the area clean. Many tasks consist of several subtasks, so you will have to do a bit of scrambling.

name: Nightmare Arts
description: Nightmare Arts is a top down arcade inspired roguelike where you must explore a dangerous afterlife equipped with nothing but magical paint.

name: Common Wealth
description: Peek into Southeast Asian politics through a lens darkly. Check ownership for authenticity, listen to stories, decide who should give up their land in the name of PROGRESS!

name: Smash Bear
description: Slash, dash, and smash through the human settlements, and unleash the rage of SMASH BEAR in this action roguelike.

name: Majestic Aristocrat
description: Majestic Aristocrat - is a 2D platformer with puzzle and quest elements. Join an aristocrat named Robert on his exciting journey through a distant kingdom. Together with him you will go on an adventure full of mysteries, dangers and unexpected discoveries.

name: Little Robbery
description: Little Robbery is a relaxing meditative 3D game, with a first-person view. You have to take on the role of an ordinary guy who decided to become a robber!

name: Forgotten Monsters
description: Battle diverse monsters using various weapons in this fast-paced game. Face exploding, resilient, and multiplying foes with agility. Experience dynamic gameplay, high-quality graphics, and sound. Ready for the ultimate test of skill and survival?

name: Scarred Mansion
description: Unleash your tactical prowess in this hauntingly innovative deck-building strategy game. Craft cards with unique effects to solve puzzles on your journey to escape the spooky house you're stuck in!

name: Estilhaço
description: Immerse yourself in a world where technology blurs the boundaries of reality, solve puzzles, or escape from a relentless monster. Are you ready to face the horror lurking in the shadows?

name: Spyware
description: Shoot, dodge, and explode your way through the floors of a rival company's headquarters. Collect gadgets and weapon parts on your way to assemble an arsenal dangerous enough to take on a private military in this fast paced FPS roguelike.

name: Naginami and the Crimson Thread
description: Guide Naginami as they ascend the enigmatic Yora in search of their beloved, Iza. In this 2.5D adventure, utilize the Crimson Thread, to swing, grapple, and pull your way through platforming challenges.

name: Ava Hunt and Thieves of the Lost
description: Experience the epic journey of Ava, as she travels the globe in search of the legendary Eternal Flame. Can you help her defeat the Glooms and Thieves of the Lost and claim the Flame?

name: Osiris
description: In a world of peace and tranquility, the fight of Bloxburg vs Cubeton turns violent! A brave adventurer goes on a long journey through the world of Bloxville to fight for the return to peace and tranquility.

name: Toy Toy Up!
description: Experience the thrill of Toy Toy Up, where the whimsical world of toys meets adrenaline-fueled action!

name: Call of Duty: Future Warfare
description:
Call of Duty: Future Warfare (internally called NX1) was a cancelled Call of Duty game worked on between 2011-2012 by Neversoft Entertainment, with a release window for around 2013.

In January 2024, video footage of an early build (dated December 2011) was leaked online.

name: SaGa Frontier 2 Remastered
description: A remaster of PS1's role-playing classic SaGa Frontier 2.

name: Staub
description: A Western by IkeC

name: Project TH
description: Project TH is an action adventure video game developed and published by EVR Studio. About. Project TH is an action adventure game that is currently under development by EVR Studio. Based on the webtoon Moodang intellectual property, Project TH is set in the Unified Nation of Korea in the near future.

name: Battle of the Lexicon Lords
description: In Battle of the Lexicon Lords, players embark on a journey to defeat powerful Lexicon Lords who have taken over the realms with their mastery of words. Each Lord has a unique word as their "Keyword," representing their essence and power. Players must decipher this Keyword through a series of word puzzles akin to the popular NY Times word game to weaken the Lexicon Lord before engaging in battle!

description: A line-drawing game with some twists along the way, created for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 3.

name: Beefurious, Shura!
description: Beefurious, Shura! is a platformer game featuring Shura Hiwa, who was having a picnic with one of her Pantcakes. Her journey begins when she must save the Pantcake after he was kidnapped by a giant bee.

name: Cat Mart
description:
Join the Purrfect Adventure at Cat Mart: Your Cozy Grocery Shop!

Welcome to Cat Mart, a world of cuddly kitties and bustling aisles! Here, our feline friends aren't just customers, they're part of the family.
Embark on an adventure in this unique grocery shop where every day is a joyous animal jam.

description: GHGuessr is a community game for BastiGHG, in which players have to guess which video it is based on 3 screenshots.
